page.title: 07Maida Vale
page.content: A residential area crossed by very broad tree lined avenues,as in the case of Elgin and Sutherland Avenues.These Avenues are lined by large,end of the 19th century buildings broken up into flats. Paddington Recreation Ground is one of the few grassed areas in this locality. It also has swings and roundabouts,a very small flower garden,a cycle track and tennis courts,and a newly built all -weather playing surface for ball games. the B.B.C. Studio,Maida Vale,which is much used for music recordings,is in Delaware Road. Overall the East side of this block is more "gentrified",more like St.John's Wood over the Edgeware Road;while the Western side is more cosmopolitan,more definitely North Paddington.
